title: (x) Operation Weed and Seed - Lucida Sans Typewriter {Mike Y}
content:
Need help.. Thanks to all

Here is a sample.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [weed.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022023145/http:/typophile.com/files/weed.jpg) | 65.67 KB |
author: wandar

comments.content: Weird. Mix of Lucida Sans and Mono?

When you say 'Mono' do you mean [Lucida Sans Typewriter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022023145/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/lucida-sans-typewriter/)?

- Mike Yanega
Actually there is a [Lucida Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022023145/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=EF.107243.0.0), but Typewriter is the correct match.

OK, but you were still right about [Lucida Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022023145/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/lucida-sans/) being used there too.

- Mike Yanega
